snippet: A New York state assemblyman was found guilty on Monday on charges he accepted $22,000 in bribes in exchange for official acts, including securing legislation favoring a network of adult day-care centers operated by four businessmen....

headline.print_headline: New York State Assemblyman Found Guilty in Bribery Case
headline.main: New York State Assemblyman Found Guilty in Bribery Case

lead_paragraph: A New York state assemblyman was found guilty on Monday on charges he accepted $22,000 in bribes in exchange for official acts, including securing legislation favoring a network of adult day-care centers operated by four businessmen.
